name: Dress-up Pups
description:
Pattie is an animal-lover, working at the Dress-Up Pups fashion agency for dogs. When her boss has to leave town on important business, she's put in charge of the whole place; it's a big opportunity for her! Help her deal with ten different clients, each with their own dog and their own special requests, in this hilarious and exciting Match-3 adventure. Form chains of matching symbols to clear them from the grid. Play puzzle peaces to the bottom of the screen to collect them. Once you´ve collected all puzzle pieces for an outfit, you can put the final outfit for the cute little pets together.

- Over 190 Match3 levels and 21 outfits
- 3 game modes: swap mode, group mode and chain mode
- Lots of puzzle mini games
